questions: Where is the Community Extension Service office?
Where to locate the Community Extension Service (CES) office?
Where to find the Community Extension Service office?
Location of Community Extension Service office
answers: The Community Extension Service Office is located at the ground floor of the Don Rodolfo T. Lizares, Sr Building also known as the main building. It is facing the colege library and is located along the Human Resource Department. Here's an image of the CES Department:
